concept.title: 5306.202 Establishing or Maintaining Alternative Sources

li.p: (b)(1) The Life Cycle Sustainment Plan (LCSP)/Acquisition Strategy approval authority is authorized to sign and approve the Determination and Findings (D&F) required by FAR 6.202(b)(1) .
